html: 5.17.17  7:34 pm   What's your favorite word?

5.17.17  7:33 pm   Since you have finished history of the entire world, i guess, do you plan to focus on bigger projects or smaller projects now?

     how about some medium sized projects
5.17.17  7:19 pm   verbal irony or sarcasm?
5.17.17  7:17 pm   How long did it take you to create the history of the world video?

5.17.17  7:04 pm   how long does it take you to make videos like history of the world, i guess

     that one took much longer than any other video i've made. the only other video i have made which is similar was history of japan, but history of the world was much more intense and complicated to make for almost every reason

5.17.17  7:00 pm   are u a bimbo

     i'm not sure exactly what a bimbo is

5.17.17  6:57 pm   Hey Bill! In previous Q&As you mentioned how different you were from other kids growing up. Are there any memories that stand out to you about becoming who you are today?

     on my first day of kindergarten, i remember walking in and everyone was already there (it was like activity time or something) and there was a big game of checkers going on, or something. everyone was doing stuff, and having a good time. and i wished i was a part of it, but there was a never a good time to interrupt

      Also, what is one thing you want the whole world to understand that it just doesn't get?

     everyone is nice
5.17.17  6:54 pm   Sunlight or moonlight?

5.17.17  6:29 pm   Why is your content so informal?

     why would it be more formal

5.17.17  6:26 pm   what gives you satisfaction

     presenting my thoughts and feelings to others, in various ways

5.17.17  6:09 pm   Did you expect the 'history of the entire world, I guess' to be so kickass?

     i tried to make it that way on purpose
5.17.17  6:06 pm   do you ever get annoyed at repeated questions?
5.17.17  6:03 pm   What's the process of creating one of your videos?

5.17.17  6:03 pm   How do you stay so positive?

     that's just the winning attitude

5.17.17  5:58 pm   is it up to you to do your content as you please

     yes

      or are you given assignments from somebody?

     no

5.17.17  5:33 pm   does acience make babies

     no, it just tries to figure out how the babies are made

5.17.17  5:29 pm   which type of fruit do you think you relate to on a deep psychological level?

     passion

5.17.17  5:26 pm   How is your life on Earth?

     it's going great so far, i am figuring things out as i go

5.17.17  5:13 pm   im glad you are a part of the no capital letters team thank you

     i do use capital letters

5.17.17  5:11 pm   why do you say you can't sing higher than the B above middle C when at the end of "we could just get high" you do that F5 "YEEEEAAAH"?

     ah that's right i forgot about that one

5.17.17  5:08 pm   do you think maybe everything probably just doesn't matter ever and we can just...do stuff?

     things matter, and you can also do stuff

5.17.17  4:53 pm   do u like reharmonizing music that didn't have the right chords to begin with?

     oh hell yeah!

5.17.17  4:52 pm   want to hear a funny joke?

     sure
5.17.17  4:51 pm   do you answer every question you get or not please respond because i am sad

5.17.17  4:48 pm   Bill why are you not on social media often ??it hurts me m u c h

     sometimes i focus on audio/video content instead, which is in some ways more valualbe than text and pictures. although i have tried to a lot of both so far, and i will continue to do a lot of both, in the future. i also spend a huge amount of time answering questions which may or may not be a good idea considering the amount of content i still have to make

5.17.17  4:47 pm   why do you make weird songs?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable
5.17.17  4:44 pm   did the chicken come first or the egg?

5.17.17  4:39 pm   am i oblidged to ask you about cactus

     no

     i didn't see the coin

     by trying all the notes! and then trying some of them together

     i guess i will have to just use my best judgement
